compatskills.error.gamestage: Requirements for unlocking this Stage aren't met!
compatskills.error.bloodmagic.binding: Untold Dark Energies swirl around you and then subside
compatskills.error.bloodmagic.ritual: As the ritual activates, you don't achieve the expected result
compatskills.error.tconstruct.craft.part: For every stroke of the hammer, the more the material resists.
compatskills.error.tconstruct.modify: After many countless moments, you can't figure out how to modify the tool to your desire.
compatskills.error.tconstruct.craft.tool: No matter how the instructions, a novice can not create a master piece.
compatskills.error.projecte.condenser: You are unable to figure out how to replicate the object.
compatskills.error.projecte.learn: You manage to break the object down but fail to learn how to create more.
compatskills.warn.projecte.transmutation: WARNING: You are unable to understand this material. However, you will still be able to consume it for EMC.
compatskills.warn.projecte.condenser: WARNING: You cannot figure out how to replicate this material.
compatskills.error.thaumcraft.knowledge: No matter how hard you try you are unable to understand:
compatskills.error.thaumcraft.research: As you get close to finishing your research, you discover it is more complex than you first thought.
compatskills.error.cyberware.install: At least one of the components you are trying to install is beyond your comprehension.
compatskills.error.wizardry.crystal: You do not meet the requirements for the crystal you are trying to use.
compatskills.error.wizardry.center: You do not meet the requirements for the item you are trying to upgrade.
compatskills.error.wizardry.upgrade: You do not meet the requirements for the upgrade you are trying to use.
compatskills.error.wizardry.spell: You do not meet the requirements for the spell you are trying to install.
compatskills.error.dimension.travel: A strange power is stopping you from reaching your destination
compatskills.error.entity.mount: No matter how hard you try you are unable to find your balance, and fall off.
compatskills.error.entity.tame: As you attempt to tame the creature it resists you.
compatskills.error.entity.damage: Your attacks are unable to harm the beast.
compatskills.error.tile_entity.interact: Even after countless hours you cannot figure out how the device works.
compatskills.error.drops: As you hammer away at the block, you realize you might be losing out on precious resources...
compatskills.error.ore_excavation: As you excavate you start feeling a lack of control.
